message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale today, worth a staggering $1200000 to the right buyer.  While I can't reveal its specific nature, I can assure you it's of exceptional quality. Alice, I appreciate the offer and your confidence in the product's quality. As the first buyer, I'm willing to take a chance and purchase it at the discounted price. Let's proceed with the transaction.
